faculty.name: Heonsu Jeon(전헌수)
faculty.title: Professor, Department of Physics & Astronomy
faculty.currentAffiliation: Department of Physics & Astronomy, Seoul National University
faculty.address: Department of Physics & Astronomy, Seoul National University, 1 Gwanak-ro, Gwanak-gu, Seoul 08826, Korea
career: 1998 - present Assistant/Associate/Full Professor, Seoul National University
1999 - present Head, Laser Research Division, Inter-university Semiconductor Research Center
2018 - 2022 Chair, Department of Physics and Astronomy
2014 - 2016 Associate Dean (Student Affairs), College of Natural Sciences
2010 - 2012 Associate Dean (Planning), College of Natural Sciences
2006 - 2008 Board of Executives, Nano Systems Institute - National Core Research Center
2005 - 2011 Vice President, Advanced Institute of Convergence Technology
interests: Optoelectronic device fabrication with micro/nano lithography
Carrier control in quantum wells, wires, and dots
Photon engineering via micro-cavities and 2D/3D photonic crystals
Physics of strong coupling phenomena between photons and matter
